title: Mixed Grain Pilaf with Beetroot

ingredients.content: 200 g mixed grains (e.g. bulgar wheat, red rice and millet)
½ cucumber, deseeded, cut in pieces (approx. 150 g)
75 g red peppers, cut in pieces
1 small handful fresh coriander leaves (approx. 10 g)

preparations.content: Place water, ½ tsp salt and oil in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket then weigh in mixed grains and add bay leaf. Steam <b>17 min/100°C/speed 4<b>.
Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula and transfer grains to a serving bowl then stir to loosen. Empty mixing bowl.
Place cucumber, onions, red peppers, lemon juice, oil, coriander, 1 tsp salt and pepper in mixing bowl then chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>. Pour over grains in serving bowl.
Place serving bowl with grains on mixing bowl lid and weigh in beetroot. Remove from lid and mix together well with spatula. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Buy a packet of mixed grains that all have the same cooking time. We used a mix of bulgar wheat, red rice and millet. Adjust cooking time accordingly.
